mapper.update: UPDATE users_tb SET name = #{name}, initials = #{initials}, lifyea = #{lifyea}, mt = #{mt}, de = #{de}, sexdstn = #{sexdstn} WHERE user_seq = #{user_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT analysis_seq, sexdstn, month_num, height, rank, animal_img FROM analysis_2007_tb WHERE month_num = IF(PERIOD_DIFF((SELECT LEFT(max(height_seq),6) FROM height_tb WHERE user_seq = #{user_seq}), (SELECT CONCAT(lifyea,mt) FROM users_tb WHERE user_seq = #{user_seq}) ) < 229, PERIOD_DIFF((SELECT LEFT(max(height_seq),6) FROM height_tb WHERE user_seq = #{user_seq}), (SELECT CONCAT(lifyea,mt) FROM users_tb WHERE user_seq = #{user_seq}) ) , 228) AND sexdstn = (SELECT sexdstn FROM users_tb WHERE user_seq = #{user_seq}) AND height >= ( SELECT h.height FROM height_tb h, (select max(height_seq) as height_seq from height_tb WHERE user_seq = #{user_seq}) dh WHERE h.height_seq = dh.height_seq ) ORDER BY analysis_seq LIMIT 1
